SEARCH

Package elevator.helper

package elevator.helper
This package contains helper classes for the elevator simulation.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    elevator
    This package contains the classes that are used to simulate an elevator system.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DirectionHandler
    Handles the logic for determining if an elevator should change direction based on the efficiency ratings of floors.
    FileHandler
    The FileHandler class reads input data from files for the initialization of the elevator system.
    LoadUnloadHandler
    A utility class that handles loading and unloading of passengers in an elevator.
    StateHandler
    The StateHandler class provides methods to save and load the state of an Elevator object.
